Articles.Content:
I have an older laptop and have adjusted my setting so it runs fine.

but the whenever something explodes my computer lags a lot or sometimes just stops for 10 seconds.

i was wondering if there was a way to turn down the explosion fx quality.

sorry if there is a setting I just missed seeing and wasted your time

on a side note I can't say I really want to go back to the old explosions because the explosions that appear after being frozen for 10 seconds are awesome.
I don't know of a particular setting that affects explosions, but more information could help: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

I know that when I crash some huge amount of parts into the ground at the same time it lags, but it doesn't fully stop... I'm on windows, so that may have something to do with it. The explosion itself shouldn't have much affect, unless lots of parts are exploding As @Master Tao said, more info could help.

Cheers,

ToTheMun
